WorkItem.Description:
I am wondering if DataJS is suitable to be used on the server side in a node application?  The OData.org website suggests that it is (by implication): http://www.odata.org/libraries#node.js   
Â 
But on the other hand, it also seems that the JSON parser depends on the window object.  Wouldn't that make it not usable by Node?
WorkItem.Summary: Is DataJS a NODE capable library?

Comments.Message: It's not just the JSON parser. There is also a dependency on window.XMLHttpRequest or, if this is undefined window.ActiveXObject. Both of these are not available in Node.js.
